data.actual_result: it scrolls up a tiny bit that is noticeable if you do it multiple times
data.short_description: every time you expand and collapse a search result it scrolls you up a bit
data.steps_to_repro: - search for something that shows enough amount of results (i searched for "1" in DTesters - scroll down and find a long message that isn't too close to the top search result - click on it multiple times - observe
